program: Online Master of Engineering in Engineering Management

sections.text: The Online M.Eng. in Engineering Management prepares engineers for leadership roles integrating technical expertise with management skills.

items: Core courses in project management, systems engineering, leadership
sections.text: Students take online courses in leadership and systems engineering, choosing electives to match career goals.

items: Bachelor’s degree in engineering or STEM field
sections.text: Applicants must hold a STEM bachelor’s and have work experience; GRE is not required.
Graduates move into leadership roles in technology, product, and systems management.
